item.title: ベラルーシは、ミンスクに迂回した2021年のライアンエアー便で逮捕されたベラルーシ人ジャーナリスト、ロマン・プロタセビッチに、さまざまな罪で8年の判決を下す（Caleb Davis/Reuters)
item.description:
Caleb Davis / Reuters:
Belarus sentences Roman Protasevich, the Belarusian journalist arrested on a 2021 Ryanair flight diverted to Minsk, to eight years on a range of charges  —  A Belarusian journalist who was arrested after being hauled off a Ryanair plane that was forced to land in Minsk almost two years ago …

item.title: RSF、「フェイクコンテンツ産業」が報道の自由度ランキングの「変動性」を高めたと発表、米国は3ランク下がって45位、ロシアは9ランク下がって164位（Bron Maher/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Bron Maher / Press Gazette:
RSF says the “fake content industry” has increased “volatility” in its press freedom rankings; the US fell three spots to 45 and Russia fell nine places to 164  —  RSF's secretary-general said this year's index was characterised by “major falls and unprecedented changes”.

item.title: 情報源: Tucker Carlsonの暴力と人種に関する扇動的な見解を示すテキストメッセージが、彼の解雇とFoxがDominionと和解する決定に貢献した（New York Times）。

New York Times:
Sources: a text message from Tucker Carlson showing inflammatory views on violence and race contributed to his firing and Fox's decision to settle with Dominion  —  The discovery of the text message contributed to a chain of events that ultimately led to Tucker Carlson's firing.

item.title: 情報源: 2023年に2度目のレイオフがtheSkimmを襲い、スタッフの〜13%に影響、LinkedInの投稿によると、削減対象は営業幹部とクリエイティブディレクター（Lucia Moses/Insider）。

Sources: layoffs hit theSkimm for a second time in 2023, affecting ~13% of staff; LinkedIn posts indicate cuts include sales executives and a creative director  —  - Newsletter publisher TheSkimm laid off 13%, or about 22 people.  — It's the second layoff this year for the once-buzzy millennial media outlet.
